body_html:
Very cool. I was originally planning on doing this next week. A couple questions I have:

  1. Why outputting probability? I would prefer outputting logits to support faster backward via CrossEntropyLoss. I was thinking an interface like https://github.com/peterzhang2029/AdaptiveSoftmax/blob/master/adaptive_softmax.py with both AdaptiveSoftmax and a custom loss function. Perhaps we can add a flag to control it?
  2. Why not writing this in ATen?
